column1: 1. The Indicator Sheet will allow you to set yearly targets/achievements for the Indicators mentioned in the Programme Design Sheet.

2. Please pick indicators/Statements from Programme Design sheet - activities/ milestones/ goals that you would like to track over the duration of the grant to communicate the work done under the project and the change it led to.
3. This sheet will allow you to set yearly targets upto 5 years, please discuss with the concerned program lead before deciding on the duration of the grant.
4. The End of Year target values should ideally be in numbers or a one word responses for qualitative achievements (such as Yes,No etc).
5. Please avoid percentages or mention the numbers in brackets where it is used.
6. Please ignore and DO NOT delete the hidden columns and rows
